titleStmt.title: The ravenous beast discovered and the devourer pursued in a short account truly stated for the unjust proceedings and cruel dealings by Dove Williamson, priest of Elton in the county of Nottingham, against William Claytor of the same town / [by] William Smith.
titleStmt.author: Smith, William, d. 1673.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Friends' Library (London, England)
